Member Function Documentation

static MatrixPtrType AMD::rand_psd_t< Eigen::Matrix< double, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic > >::apply ( int64_t  n,
int  seed = -1 
)
inlinestatic

0. If there is no good seed given, use a good random seed

  1. Generate a uniformly random ([0,1]) matrix A

Note: There is a random function (MatrixXd::Random(m,n), but I don't know what kind of random numbers they are using. So, we will use boost::random to fill in the entries. Change it later when we understand Random() better.

  1. Compute A = A+A^T, which makes A symmetric
  2. As A(i,j) is originally (0,1), we can add n*I to make it PSD
